author: nyssnisacha
content: i thought the senheng dealer in my place is bad but then it turns out im not the only one. is it like a standard manual for senheng dealers to answer when asked about cheaper phones? 'when are you getting a new stock?' "i dont know" 'when do you think it will arrive then? the estimation?' "i dont know" 10 times of ' i dont know' and i seriously feel like slapping that guy.
